# [HippoVideo](https://*.hippovideo.io)

HippoVideo Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: HippoVideo
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: *.hippovideo.io
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
